alert.note: Alert for Arco, Mud Lake Desert; Lower Snake River Plain; Upper Snake River Plain (Idaho) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued May 24 at 7:01PM MDT by NWS Pocatello
info.description: ...A strong thunderstorm will impact portions of western Bonneville and northwestern Bingham Counties through 745 PM MDT... At 701 PM MDT, Doppler radar was tracking a strong thunderstorm near Taber, or 15 miles west of Blackfoot, moving northeast at 30 mph. HAZARD...Wind gusts up to 50 mph and penny size hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. Minor damage to outdoor objects is possible. Locations impacted include... Taber and East Butte. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.75 IN MAX WIND GUST...50 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a building. Torrential rainfall is also occurring with this storm and may lead to localized flooding. Do not drive your vehicle through flooded roadways.

area.areaDesc: Arco, Mud Lake Desert; Lower Snake River Plain; Upper Snake River Plain
